Package au.csiro.pathling.caching

Class EntityTagInterceptor

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.caching.EntityTagInterceptor
@Component @Profile("server") public class EntityTagInterceptor extends Object
Intercepts requests and validates ETags, skipping processing if possible. Also adds ETags to responses.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Constructor Details

    • EntityTagInterceptor

      public EntityTagInterceptor(@Nonnull ServerConfiguration configuration, @Nonnull CacheableDatabase database, @Nonnull ConformanceProvider conformanceProvider)
      Parameters:
      configuration - configuration controlling the behaviour of the interceptor
      database - Database for use in retrieving cache keys
      conformanceProvider - for determining the cacheability of conformance statement requests

  • Method Details

    • checkIncomingTag

      public void checkIncomingTag(@Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, @Nullable RequestDetails requestDetails, @Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Checks for the If-None-Match header and validates the tag, skipping processing if possible. Also, adds an ETag header to the response.
      Parameters:
      request - the servlet request object
      requestDetails - the details about the request inferred by HAPI
      response - the servlet response object

    • makeRequestNonCacheable

      public static void makeRequestNonCacheable(@Nullable jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, @Nonnull ServerConfiguration configuration)
      Sets caching headers on a response to make sure that it doesn't get cached.
      Parameters:
      response - a HttpServletResponse upon which to set caching headers
      configuration - the ServerConfiguration for the server, which controls which header values are used

    • requestIsCacheable

      public static boolean requestIsCacheable(@Nonnull jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Checks whether we regard this request as cacheable.
      Parameters:
      request - a HttpServletRequest
      Returns:
      true if the request is cacheable, false otherwise
